name: Identify
components: V, S, M (wine stirred with an owl's feather)
text: This spell functions as detect magic, except that it gives you a +10 enhancement bonus on Spellcraft checks made to identify the properties and command words of magic items in your possession. This spell does not allow you to identify artifacts.
components_zh: 语言, 姿势, 材料 (用猫头鹰羽毛搅拌过的酒)
text_zh: 该法术的功能如同‘侦测魔法 (detect magic)’一般，不过它在用于鉴别你所持有的魔法物品时，判断魔法物品的功能和命令词的法术辨识检定获得+10增强加值。该法术并不能让你鉴别神器。
